Class JsonParameterisedAction

java.lang.Object
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.action.Action
ca.on.oicr.gsi.shesmu.plugin.action.JsonParameterisedAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
FakeAction, RunReport
public abstract class JsonParameterisedAction extends Action
An Action that stores some of its parameters in a JSON object
